website_summaries.verdict: The Air Zoom Winflo 2 from Nike was generally well-received by new and veteran runners. A lot of them wrote that the upper cover system was comfortable. Also, for them, the durability was consistent and the overall quality was superb. Many neutral runners recommended this road shoe. On the other hand, the fit wasn’t very agreeable to a few of those who tried it.
pros: Several runners wrote that the 2nd version of the Nike Air Zoom Winflo was suitably lightweight
Many noted that the price of this version was affordable
Some testers loved that they were able to use this shoe for a variety of activities: running, training and walking
The coverage was snug yet secure for runners
they didn’t feel as if their feet were strangled by the materials
The color schemes gained some fans, and they said that it was eye-catching, but not distractingly bright
The underfoot cushioning was adequate, according to runners
they felt that it was springy and responsive
Many testers described this shoe as ‘comfortable’
A consumer wrote that because of its breathable upper, the interior essentially became free from odor-causing moisture
cons: Some runners felt that the 2nd version of the Nike Air Zoom Winflo was a bit narrow
The midsole broke down easily on one tester, essentially diminishing the underfoot comfort

customer_reviews.title: Completely let down they are not authentic shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is definitely a counterfeit there is plastic tape between the materials that makes a crackling noise they don’t fit the same as ones that I got at the store they don’t look the same it’s just something not right with him I’m extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Cavender

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but not worth the price they want
customer_reviews.text: They nailed me for $120 on these shoes. They are very comfortable, but not worth $120 from this seller. I see they've lowered their price now. Shoe is comfy, but the shoelaces are extremely annoying. These things come untied at least a dozen times a day (I am not a double knotter) because the laces are so slippery. And if the soles get wet, bw prepared to squeak your way across whatever floor you're walking on until you dry the bottoms. Went from every day shoe to just a gym shoe now.. I would definitely buy another pair. But wouldn't spend more then $50 on them
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: These sneakers are awesome! Very comfortable and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sneakers for a vacation I had where I knew I'd be doing a lot of walking. They're very comfortable, lightweight, dry quickly and have great traction. I wore them hiking up the Andes mountains and every day walking through towns with paved streets, cobblestone, and dirt roads. They were comfortable on every surface, the cushioning was great; and being so light weight it was a nice after doing so much walking. Even after getting dirty with all the use they cleaned up very easily and still look just about brand new. I would definitely suggest these sneakers to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Walking on a cloud...
customer_reviews.text: Like walking on clouds. Very comfortable, slightly snug for the size. But if you wear thin compression socks with these shoes, they are perfect. Be careful not to rub the mesh against anything or get them hung up on something cause they will rip easy. The cushioning on the heel is great for a me... 6'3" 240lbs. All in all great shoe. I have a pair for work (12 hour shifts) and a pair for everyday life.
customer_reviews.author: PikeG2

customer_reviews.title: My second pair
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are super light but well made. I think these are some top line running shoes. I don't run much these days, more fast walk, but I wish I had these back in the day. My only negative is I wear out the inside of the heel before the rest of the shoe is even showing much wear. Otherwise I got 2 years out of the first pair. Not bad.
customer_reviews.author: michael maloney

customer_reviews.title: Remarkably comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Nike running shoes for years. I usually stick to the Pegasus series but gave these a try. I was pleasantly surprised by how comfortable these were to run in from day 1. My favorite running shoes by far for the last several years.
customer_reviews.author: Uber Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Total disappointment!!!
customer_reviews.text: I felt like the picture that their showing is not the shoe that I received. The shoe looked like it mid way shoe over the ankle no... 🙄 it look like a no disrespect a older person type shoe. I bought these shoes for my 14 year old. They are a total disappointment!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Beckton

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth pair of this shoe. It is great quality and the performance is great! I get between three and four hundred running miles out of them before they need replacing.
customer_reviews.author: GREGORY

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable and Durable
customer_reviews.text: These running shoes are extremely comfortable. I actually have one pair for running and another pair for everyday use. These running shoes are very durable. I have had no problems with squeaking.
customer_reviews.author: Fred S.

customer_reviews.title: run real small and narrow
customer_reviews.text: i used to buy nike all the time but not any more.i always wear 11 1/2 so i bought a 12 super tight can't return now. i have switched to asics no problem with size and are super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ron S.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of these shoes and they’re a nice every day shoe. Sometimes I have to buy the men’s version to get my size, like these. I walk a lot on concrete and these hold up very well, and they’re pretty comfortable. I can usually catch them at a better price on Amazon than at the mall.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Harding

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes didn't last 2 months. Shoes developed holes on top and were coming apart at the soles. This was discovered 2 weeks after the return window had closed and Nike tried to say it was caused by normal wear and tear. So, I guess they think it's normal for their shoes to last no longer than 2 months. I would never buy these shoes again and will never purchase Nike shoes again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Real review
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this purchase. Perfectly sized, but I am a Nike repeat shopper so I know how they fit. Brand new in box as of I went to the store. Lazy of me, yes.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a Winflo 5
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair in a few month of Winflo 5's. They seem to fit my arch and give me just the right padding in the sole. This black pair I bought to wear to play golf. It was very comfortable to wear on the course.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Rieger

customer_reviews.title: Nice pair of shoes and a nice price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this right before I went on a trip and they have worked out great. Fits as they should and easy to slide on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Elswiki

customer_reviews.title: Nice sneaker but wrong color
customer_reviews.text: Nice lightweight and comfortable sneaker. Unfortunately the color I selected was not the color shipped

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Comfortable, breathable, and look good. Second pair because I wore out the first pair! Will buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit. Nice comfortable pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. This is my second pair this year. I bought black for work and the other one is for causal wear. Both shoes I also use them in the gym.
customer_reviews.author: jep

customer_reviews.title: Fit great. Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable running shoe I’ve ever owned. This is my second pair. Light and breathable.
customer_reviews.author: Tom B

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my husband for work and they’re great shoes he loves them and says they’re very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: William Horstman

customer_reviews.title: Great for interval training
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes because I needed some new interval training shoes. After running in them a couple of times I knew I had made a good investment. They are light and are rigid enough for the track, without sacrificing comfort. However, after forgetting my usual distance shoes, I ran a 7 mile run (a normal cross country practice) on the road and had sore knees and ankles the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Second pair of these, love them. Perfect for working out or walking around town.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 3rd pair and they're perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes so much I bought 3 pair. They're so comfortable. Offering great foot support for long days on my feet. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sterling Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Running on clouds!!
customer_reviews.text: This shoes are awesome for running and super comfy. I do HIIT with them and don't have any problems. I hear some people have an issue with squeaking but I have yet to experience this issue. I will be looking into more colors!!!

customer_reviews.title: Dependable structure and nice design
customer_reviews.text: I like the neutral color and the easy fit of my orthotics into this shoe.

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fit great and are my preference for running. I run about 5 miles per day on the road and this is my second pair of these.
customer_reviews.author: Steve McClure

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: They are great shoes but I thought I was ordering women's not men's.. my mistake. I'm going to send them back and hopefully get a pair of women's!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Good running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, light in weight, good grip on the sole. Hope I can get another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Demetrius Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Incredible!
customer_reviews.text: Finally, Nike made a good running shoe that’s right for me. This particular design is both aesthetic and super comfortable. Over the last few weeks I’ve had some of the best runs I’ve ever had; this shoes can take most the credit for that.

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes and received them in very good time. They fit as was expected which I was very happy about. Nothing is worse than having to send something back due to a bad fit. They are very light and comfortable and will probably buy another pair when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Jerome

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart and only had them for a few months barely even worn
customer_reviews.text: They are falling apart I am extremely disappointed it has only been a few months $100 down the drain. The tag that says the shoe size fell off and now the inner soles have slipped out.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect where grip is needed
customer_reviews.text: Just like any pair of shoes you have to break them in and by the end of my first workday the fit perfectly. My favorite part about these shoes is the grip I have on snow and ice. I have yet to slip since getting them.

customer_reviews.title: “Walking on Clouds”
customer_reviews.text: This shoe offers endless comfort for your feet. I bought it for work and I always recommend my colleagues to get it because we work long hours. It’s like walking on clouds!

customer_reviews.title: They’re really great shoes!

customer_reviews.title: Great for plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: I have flat feet. These are one of the few shoes I can run in. These get me well over 500 miles and I am on my fourth pair.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied

customer_reviews.title: tight but snazzy
customer_reviews.text: I think I'll like these once they're a bit more broken in, but I was surprised to find them a bit narrow and tight around my foot... and not in a snug, form fitting kind of way, but a let's strangle this guys foot to death kind of way. I don't think I'd order a larger size, per se, but if you're in between sizes typically you'll probably be happy erring on the larger one. They look good and provide a great bounce to each step.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected and like the shoe for the money.

customer_reviews.text: Nike has been making their shoes thinner and lighter, which is great for some people. These fit more like the older styles 3-5 years ago, that's what I was looking for.

customer_reviews.title: My teenage son has the hardest time finding comfortable sneakers. He loves these so much
customer_reviews.text: My teenage son has the hardest time finding comfortable sneakers. He loves these so much, that we have to keep finding them on line when he outgrows his current size. It seems like they've been discontinued, because they aren't found in stores, but the shoe is great for a wider flat foot.

customer_reviews.text: Best running shoe I've ever owned. Plenty of cushion and gentle correction for my moderate pronation. Get them while you can!

customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT shoe. It’s light and VERY comfortable. It’s my second pair. I hope they make it forever.
